cause.description:
Chabad Jewish Center on Campus Serving Texas A&M University and Blinn College in College Station, TX. Chabad at Texas A&M is part of the worlwide Chabad Lubavitch Movement with over 1,000 centers world wide and over 120 Centers on Campus.
We are here to provide our services to Students and Faculty alike to Texas A&M University and Blinn College. As a social welfare organization we provide our services to all not withstanding religious affiliation.
Help support our wonderful work and be a part of our efforts.
To make a donation directly or to join our monthly donation program please visit www.jewishaggies.com/donate.
1. To provide a home away from home for students at Texas A&M University
2. To provide Social and Religious services to the Brazos Valley
3. To make the world a better place with promoting acts of goodness and kindness.
cause.mission: Judaism done Joyfully. Jewish Life, Texas Style
cause.name: Chabad at Texas A&M University
